metadata.synopsis: If the DU has gone mad, they can be seen skulking in the bushes around the camp, planning on killing the party.THe GROUP_PLAYERS slot will be the WasPartnered character of the Dark Urge

21.speaker: Narrator
21.text: *The sacks of unclaimed blood cheer one another, while you, thorn-pricked pile of nothing, leer.*
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: DU creeps forward to a shady spot to observe the party. They stand in a hunched idle, staring dead-eyed at their COMPANIONS. Their still pose is broken only by random twitches and ticks.

28.speaker: Narrator
28.text: *No mortal cell could hold you. The bars broke like bones.*

50.speaker: Narrator
50.text: *Your curdled mind is eager for their sleep, so you can strike with the death-dream.*

23.speaker: DarkUrge
23.text: The balance of the world restored. The balance of these lives, mortal and otherwise, brought to account.
23.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Withers approaches the fire and raises a goblet, preparing to give a toast.(right hand). Keep withers walk slow, he's very old (but not weak).

54.speaker: Withers
54.text: The balance of the world restored. The balance of these lives, mortal and otherwise, brought to account.
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Withers approaches the fire and raises a goblet, preparing to give a toast.(right hand). Keep withers walk slow, he's very old (but not weak).

19.speaker: Withers
19.context:
CinematicNodeContext: goblet in right hand

Other characters present all raise glasses as well, in toastNodeContext: Raises his glass, the toast's finale - the last line in the epilogue (right hand raise)

12.speaker: Narrator
12.text: *Many killing moons have waxed. As each set, more your mind waned.*
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: DU creeps forward to a shady spot to observe the party. They stand in a hunched idle, staring dead-eyed at their COMPANIONS. Their still pose is broken only by random twitches and ticks.

5.speaker: Narrator
5.text: *No mortal cell could hold you. The bars broke like bones.*
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: Extra sentimental shots of companions?

27.speaker: Narrator
27.text: *You pray with each new heart-spillage. You worship with your diseased embrace - siring a mad legion.*
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: Extra sentimental shots of companions?

11.speaker: Narrator
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Extra sentimental shots of companions?

20.speaker: Narrator
20.text: *Yet... in the treacle-pulp of your brain, something called you back here.*
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Extra sentimental shots of companions?

34.speaker: Narrator
34.text: *What is this place? It was something. Once. Bonds, warmth, strength, fear... love...*
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Extra sentimental shots of companions?

15.speaker: Narrator
15.text: *Now, you feel only impatience for these blood-sacks to sleep, so you can strike with the death-dream.*
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: Extra sentimental shots of companions?

29.speaker: DarkUrge
29.context: CinematicNodeContext: DU absentmindedly picks at a specific SCAB on their face.

7.speaker: Narrator
7.text: *Each day you sing his hymns. Each night you dream in red.*
7.context: CinematicNodeContext: DU absentmindedly picks at a specific SCAB on their face.

63.speaker: Narrator
63.text: *Not long now. Not long. Wait until they are at rest to strike. Patience.*
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: DU absentmindedly picks at a specific SCAB on their face.

51.speaker: DarkUrge
51.context: CinematicNodeContext: DU absentmindedly picks at a specific SCAB on their face.

9.speaker: Narrator
9.text: *You have cultivated these crusted companions. Wrenching, ripping, scraping. But you do have a favourite...*
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: DU absentmindedly picks at a specific SCAB on their face.

57.speaker: DarkUrge
57.text: Eat a scrap of your thigh-scrape.
57.context: CinematicNodeContext: DU offscreen rips off a PIECE OF FLESH from their thigh and devours it. Eyes still locked onto the PARTY.

41.speaker: Narrator
41.text: *Each piece of the body Bhaal sculpted is sacred. Waste it not. Cherish it. Savour it.*
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: DU offscreen rips off a PIECE OF FLESH from their thigh and devours it. Eyes still locked onto the PARTY.

22.speaker: DarkUrge
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: OTS : Scratching motion at chest region

32.speaker: Narrator
32.text: *Scritch-scratch, scritch-scratch, one day you will excavate all the way down to your thrumming heart.*
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: OTS : Scratching motion at chest region

44.speaker: DarkUrge
44.context: CinematicNodeContext: OTS : Tearing motion in stomach region

18.speaker: Narrator
18.text: *It's just as satisfying the fiftieth time as the first.*
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: OTS : Tearing motion in stomach region

8.speaker: Narrator
8.text: *The last nerve of a wobbling block snaps. You don't need those molars, meat-thing that you are!*

6.speaker: Narrator
6.text: *The revelry is falling to a lull... Your witching hour draws close.*
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: DU brings their DAGGER to the ready and starts marching, dead-eyed towards the PARTY, still twitching periodically.

14.speaker: DarkUrge
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: DU brings their DAGGER to the ready and starts marching, dead-eyed towards the PARTY, still twitching periodically.

13.speaker: DarkUrge
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: DU brings their DAGGER to the ready and starts marching, dead-eyed towards the PARTY, still twitching periodically.

43.speaker: Narrator
43.text: *The pity gags in your gullet. Yes, they will die. Yes. Just for you.*
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: DU brings their DAGGER to the ready and starts marching, dead-eyed towards the PARTY, still twitching periodically.

35.speaker: DarkUrge
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: DU brings their DAGGER to the ready and starts marching, dead-eyed towards the PARTY, still twitching periodically.

2.speaker: Narrator
2.text: *Kill them all, mad Bhaal-bairn. Kill them all.*
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: DU brings their DAGGER to the ready and starts marching, dead-eyed towards the PARTY, still twitching periodically.

53.speaker: DarkUrge
53.text: Faerûn is my votive fodder, O Bhaal below.

65.speaker: DarkUrge
65.text: Father, I love you. I'm a good spawn. A good little spawn.

36.speaker: DarkUrge
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: DU remains focused on the party. Shot of a pool of piss forming at their feet if possible.

62.speaker: Narrator
62.text: *Worse than an animal, it all flows freely now and mingles with the gall. Your body is not yours.*
62.context: CinematicNodeContext: DU remains focused on the party. Shot of a pool of piss forming at their feet if possible.

25.speaker: DarkUrge
25.text: Glance piteously upon your false bride.
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Companion toasts, enjoying the celebration, DU performs a twisted mimicry of the toast with their DAGGER.

67.speaker: Narrator
67.text: *You are Bhaal's stallion - many of your own Bhaalspawn have been born to die in this half-year.*
67.context: CinematicNodeContext: Companion toasts, enjoying the celebration, DU performs a twisted mimicry of the toast with their DAGGER.

55.speaker: Narrator
55.text: *Your new children will become the tyrant's hoard. Why do you spare even one thought for your forsaken mate?*
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Companion toasts, enjoying the celebration, DU performs a twisted mimicry of the toast with their DAGGER.

1.speaker: DarkUrge
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Companion toasts, enjoying the celebration, DU performs a twisted mimicry of the toast with their DAGGER.

60.speaker: Narrator
60.text: *As soon as it tries to pass through your lips, you feel violently ill.*
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Companion toasts, enjoying the celebration, DU performs a twisted mimicry of the toast with their DAGGER.

24.speaker: Narrator
24.text: *Now you are what he fears most. A starved ratling, an itching prowler. A reminder of his worst self, best left to history.*
24.context: CinematicNodeContext: Companion toasts, enjoying the celebration, DU performs a twisted mimicry of the toast with their DAGGER.

37.speaker: Narrator
37.text: *Neither Selûne nor Shar will claim her in the end. Bhaal wants her more than those graven gods.*
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: Companion toasts, enjoying the celebration, DU performs a twisted mimicry of the toast with their DAGGER.

16.speaker: Narrator
16.text: *You are the one villain the hero could not bring himself to kill.*
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Companion toasts, enjoying the celebration, DU performs a twisted mimicry of the toast with their DAGGER.

52.speaker: Narrator
52.text: *You taught her everything about this world. Now she knows what she will lose.*
52.context: CinematicNodeContext: Companion toasts, enjoying the celebration, DU performs a twisted mimicry of the toast with their DAGGER.

17.speaker: Narrator
17.text: *She's running from the finest day of her life - the last one.*
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Companion toasts, enjoying the celebration, DU performs a twisted mimicry of the toast with their DAGGER.

45.speaker: Narrator
45.text: *You hate him. He had the chance to level a city. You blaze with envy.*
45.context: CinematicNodeContext: Companion toasts, enjoying the celebration, DU performs a twisted mimicry of the toast with their DAGGER.

46.speaker: Narrator
46.text: *Once you forgot to break the neck you cradled. You will not make the same mistake again.*
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Companion toasts, enjoying the celebration, DU performs a twisted mimicry of the toast with their DAGGER.

31.speaker: Narrator
31.text: *He loves all living creatures. You wonder if he will forgive his own maggots.*
31.context: CinematicNodeContext: Companion toasts, enjoying the celebration, DU performs a twisted mimicry of the toast with their DAGGER.

56.speaker: Narrator
56.text: *Your darling would never agree to breed a spawn with you... The defiance begets death.*

49.speaker: DarkUrge
49.text: I have yearned to end my beloved for so long. I want this moment to be perfect.

66.speaker: DarkUrge
66.text: Father, my body is your wretched vessel. Descend upon me. Reap by my hand.

0.speaker: DarkUrge
0.text: Dread Lord... tonight, we will be glutted with tragedy, until we grow sick.

33.speaker: Narrator
33.text: *Each time you unhinge your maw, the words of the prophet tumble forth.*
